DataType.Description: Actual operating mode of the TCD

uax:Description.uax:Text: Operating mode of the TCD is unknown
TCD is ready to operate (heating, pump and cooling are switched off)
TCD is running in normal operating mode
TCD is running in leak stopper operating mode
TCD is carrying out a mould evacuation process
TCD is carrying out a pressure relief process
TCD is cooling down to StandbyTemperature and switch off
TCD is cooling down to SwitchingOffTemperature and switch off
TCD is running in Eco operating mode (energy is saved via the reduced pump speed)
TCD is running in Boost operating mode (pump runs at maximum possible speed)

Field.Name: OTHER
Field.Description: Operating mode of the TCD is unknown

Field.Name: READY_TO_OPERATE
Field.Description: TCD is ready to operate (heating, pump and cooling are switched off)

Field.Name: NORMAL_OPERATION
Field.Description: TCD is running in normal operating mode

Field.Name: LEAK_STOPPER
Field.Description: TCD is running in leak stopper operating mode

Field.Name: MOULD_EVACUATION
Field.Description: TCD is carrying out a mould evacuation process

Field.Name: PRESSURE_RELIEF
Field.Description: TCD is carrying out a pressure relief process

Field.Name: COOLING
Field.Description: TCD is cooling down to StandbyTemperature and switch off

Field.Name: SAFETY_COOLING
Field.Description: TCD is cooling down to SwitchingOffTemperature and switch off

Field.Name: ECO
Field.Description: TCD is running in Eco operating mode (energy is saved via the reduced pump speed)

Field.Name: BOOST
Field.Description: TCD is running in Boost operating mode (pump runs at maximum possible speed)

ObjectType.Description: HelpOffNormalAlarmType with additional DeviceMappingNumber for identification

Property.Description: Unique identifier/address/number for devices of the same DeviceType within a local network

ObjectType.Description: Root ObjectType representing a temperature control device with its subcomponents

Property.Description: With this Property the client can set the desired language on the user interface at the TCD

Object.Description: Identification of the device

ObjectType.Description: Represents the functional main component of a TCD

Variable.Description: Actual calculated process performance (from the view of the TCD: heating = positive value, cooling = negative value)
Actual power of the pump in kW
Actual speed of the pump in revolutions per minute
Actual Regulation Ratio (heating = positive value, cooling = negative value)
Delay Time after cooling before switching off the TCD

Object.Description: Container for the external channel(s)
Variables for the operation with an external temperature sensor
Setting and/or monitoring of the flow rate

Variable.Description: Determines whether the temperature of the main or the return is to be controlled

Object.Description: Used for switching the leak stopper mode
Information on the maintenance status of heating, cooling, pump and fluid
Iincludes parameters and nodes for mould evacuation
Setting and/or monitoring of the pressure difference between main and return line

Variable.Description: Actual pressure in the main line (Pressure return line + pump pressure)
Actual pressure in the return line
Defines to which setpoint or function the pump is controlled

Object.Description: Setting and/or monitoring the speed of the pump in percent of maximum speed

Variable.Description: The standby value temperature is approached with the Method ReduceToStandByOn. The TCD switches off.
Defines the temperature to which the TCD must be cooled down before it switches off

Object.Description: Setting and/or monitoring of the temperature in the main or return line (see InternalMeasuringPoint) or active external Sensor (ExternalSensorModeOn)
Setting and/or monitoring of the temperature difference between return and main line. Positive if temperature in return line is higher than in main line.

Variable.Description: This setpoint is for temperature limitation of the mould circuit e.g. to protect the connected tubes or the downstream water distribution system
Actual temperature in the main line
Actual temperature in the return line

Object.Description: Includes information for monitoring or controlling of an external temperature, flow rate or pressure channel

ObjectType.Description: Includes variables for the operation with an external temperature sensor

Variable.Description: Actual value of external temperature sensor

Property.Description: Setting whether switching to external sensor is performed automatically (TRUE) or manually (FALSE)

Object.Description: Settings for the closed loop control for the sensor

Method.Description: Deactivate the mode where the external temperature sensor is used for temperature control
Activate the mode where the external temperature sensor is used for temperature control

Variable.Description: Type of connected external temperature sensor

Property.Description: Return whether an external temperature sensor is used for control

ObjectType.Description: Used for switching the leak stopper mode

Method.Description: Activate the leak stopper mode (emergency operation in case of leaks in the system)

ObjectType.Description: Information on the maintenance status of heating, cooling, pump and fluid

Object.Description: Information on the maintenance status of the cooling

Method.Description: This Method sets the CurrentInterval to 0 and Status to NOT_DUE_0

Object.Description: Information on the maintenance status of the fluid

Method.Description: This Method sets the CurrentInterval to 0 and Status to NOT_DUE_0

Object.Description: Information on the maintenance status of the heating

Method.Description: This Method sets the CurrentInterval to 0 and Status to NOT_DUE_0

Object.Description: Information on the maintenance status of the pump

Method.Description: This Method sets the CurrentInterval to 0 and Status to NOT_DUE_0

ObjectType.Description: Includes parameters and nodes for mould evacuation

Variable.Description: Defines how the medium is to be emptied
Defines where the medium is to be emptied
Temperature Limitation of the mould evacuation. TCD is cooled to this temperature first if necessary.
Duration of the mould evacuation

ObjectType.Description: Includes information for monitoring or controlling of external temperature, flow rate or pressure channels

Variable.Description: Defines to which setpoint the external channel is controlled

Object.Description: Setting and/or monitoring of the flow rate
Setting and/or monitoring of the pressure difference between main and return line

Variable.Description: Actual value of the pressure in the main line
Actual value of the pressure in the return line

Property.Description: Information if the external channel is switched on

Method.Description: Switch method of the external channel for switching off
Switch method of the external channel for switching on

Object.Description: Setting and/or monitoring of the temperature
Setting and/or monitoring of the temperature difference between return and main line. Positive if temperature in return line is higher than in main line.

Variable.Description: Actual temperature in the main line
Actual temperature in the return line

ObjectType.Description: Contains components which are necessary to operate the TCD

Variable.Description: List of the active errors of the device

Property.Description: Unique identifier/address/number for devices of the same DeviceType within a local network
Indication of the severity of the highest active alarm (0 = no active alarm – 1000 = possible error)

Variable.Description: Actual hours of operation

Method.Description: The TCD on which this method is called shows itself by e.g. activation of a LED

Property.Description: Actual operating mode of the TCD

Method.Description: Deactivate the cooling down function on the TCD. If it is already in progress, it will be interrupted and the device changes back to the last selected operating mode.
Activate the cooling down function on the TCD followed by switching off
Method to reset all errors of the device

uax:Description.uax:Text: Id of the error, listed in ActiveErrors, that shall be reset

Method.Description: Main switch method of the TCD for switching off
Main switch method of the TCD for switching on

Variable.Description: Connected load, defines the connections of the TCD (pump performance, heating capacity and performance of the remaining components)
Power value for cooling, defines the power value for cooling at temperature difference 60 K between cooling water and heat transfer medium
Defines the maximum working temperature of the TCD
Nominal flow rate, defines the maximum achievable flow rate of the TCD
Power value, defines the heating capacity of the TCD with the rated voltage
